mapper.insert: insert into JMF_CONFIG (JMF_CONFIG_ID, APP_NAME, `KEY`, `VALUE`, CONFIG_TYPE, DESCRIPTION, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME) values (#{jmfConfigId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{configType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update JMF_CONFIG set APP_NAME = #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `KEY` = #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `VALUE` = #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONFIG_TYPE = #{configType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATETIME = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where JMF_CONFIG_ID = #{jmfConfigId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select JMF_CONFIG_ID, APP_NAME, `KEY`, `VALUE`, CONFIG_TYPE, DESCRIPTION, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME from JMF_CONFIG where JMF_CONFIG_ID = #{jmfConfigId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
